document_data.name: Nonakaniumi
document_data.mainbody: '''Nonakaniumi''' was a [[half-elf]] [[wizard]], well-versed in [[Kara-Tur]]an magical disciplines.
document_data.Description: Garbed in light blue, Nonakaniumi had tan skin and shoulder-length blonde hair. He had full lips, pointed ears, and a turned-up nose.
document_data.Abilities: In addition to being an accomplished wizard, Nonakaniumi was also unusually dexterous, making him difficult to hit in combat.
document_data.Possessions: Nonakaniumi owned a ''[[medallion of ESP]]'', a ''[[ring of elemental command]]'' (attuned to water), a ''[[staff of curing]]'', and a ''[[wand of wonder]]''.
document_data.Activities: Possessed of a natural affinity for water, Nonakaniumi was given his name (meaning "in the ocean" in the [[Kozakuran language]]) by a fellow wizard from [[Kozakura]]. Nonakaniumi spent much of his time studying the Eastern magical arts, and was an avid swimmer in his free time.
